keyword_dialog.note: Some keywords are not guaranteed to be present since they depend on the metadata obtained by a particular extractor. Such keywords will be replaced with "NA".
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.alt_: A secondary title of the video
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.disp: An alternative identifier for the video
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.uplo: Full name of the video uploader
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.lice: License name the video is licensed under
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.rele: The date (YYYYMMDD) when the video was released
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.time: UNIX timestamp of the moment the video became available
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.uplo: Nickname or id of the video uploader
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.loca: Physical location where the video was filmed
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.dura: Length of the video in seconds
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.view: How many users have watched the video on the platform
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.like: Number of positive ratings of the video
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.disl: Number of negative ratings of the video
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.repo: Number of reposts of the video
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.aver: Average rating give by users, the scale used depends on the webpage
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.comm: Number of comments on the video
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.is_l: Whether this video is a live stream or a fixed-length video
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.star: Time in seconds where the reproduction should start, as specified in the URL
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.end_: Time in seconds where the reproduction should end, as specified in the URL
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.form: A human-readable description of the format
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.reso: Textual description of width and height
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.tbr: Average bitrate of audio and video in KBit/s
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.acod: Name of the audio codec in use
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.vcod: Name of the video codec in use
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.file: The number of bytes, if known in advance
An estimate for the number of bytes
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.prot: The protocol that will be used for the actual download
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.epoc: Unix epoch when creating the file
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.auto: Five-digit number that will be increased with each download, starting at zero
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.play: Name or id of the playlist that contains the video
Index of the video in the playlist padded with leading zeros according to the total length of the playlist
Full name of the playlist uploader
Nickname or id of the playlist uploader
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.chap: Name or title of the chapter the video belongs to
Number of the chapter the video belongs to
Id of the chapter the video belongs to
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.seri: Title of the series or programme the video episode belongs to
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.seas: Title of the season the video episode belongs to
Number of the season the video episode belongs to
Id of the season the video episode belongs to
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.epis: Number of the video episode within a season
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.trac: Number of the track within an album or a disc
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.albu: Title of the album the track belongs to
List of all artists appeared on the album
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.disc: Number of the disc or other physical medium the track belongs to
keyword_dialog.keywords.description.rele: Year (YYYY) when the album was released
